attributes.action: Consider and implement alternatives to COVID lockdown and Tier systems
attributes.additional_details: The contextual impact of lockdown and Tier systems potentially outweigh the threat of COVID and may ensure long term societal and economic problems from which the UK may take years to recover. Consider protective alternatives adopted by other countries which are seen to be successful.
attributes.background: COVID lockdown and Tier systems cause indirect and prevailing societal problems including increased risk of severe mental health issues, poverty and places victims of abuse at serious risk.

rejection.details:
Petitions need to call on the Government or Parliament to take a specific action.

We understand that you want the Government to change its approach to Covid-19, but it's not clear what changes you want the Government to make.

We have published the following petitions, which you might like to sign:

Fund & provide services to allow the vulnerable to shield & re-open the economy: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/552023

Lift local lockdowns and Covid-19 restrictions in England: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/551469

Referendum on current restrictions and any further lockdowns: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/551539
                
You could start a new petition explaining clearly what you would like the Government or Parliament to do.
